answers.answer: Free medical care is available for Ukrainians and refugees from other countries in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The International Organization for Migration in Romania (IOM Romania) provides free medical care to refugees.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: To access medical services, refugees must first make an appointment with the IOM representatives at their office located in RomExpo.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Refugees can find medical care at RomExpo, which is located at Meresti Boulevard 65-67, Bucharest 011465.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Free consultations are offered with a family doctor, psychologist, and gynecologist.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The provided content states that medical care is free but does not specify the reason why it is provided free of charge.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The working hours for the center of assistance for refugees at RomExpo are Monday to Friday, from 9:00 to 17:00.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: To schedule an appointment with a doctor, refugees must first make an appointment with the IOM representatives at their office in RomExpo.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: All doctors are English speakers, and a free translator can be requested for medical consultations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Contact information includes RomExpo phone number 0212077000, IOM phone number +40 21 – 210.30.50, and the IOM site address https://romania.iom.int/.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The International Organization for Migration (IOM Romania) supports refugees by providing free medical care.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The primary location for refugee assistance in Bucharest is RomExpo, which serves as the center of assistance for refugees from Ukraine.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: You can get in touch with IOM representatives by making an appointment at their office in RomExpo or by calling their phone number +40 21 – 210.30.50.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.
